well i don't =
know so much about faces but i do alittle about reverse speech which sorta =
of happened by mistake...I know if i look hard i will be able to find a fil=
e that I got my mistake its a regular digital recording which i didn't no t=
hat was being recorded (my 5 year use to do that alot) anyway he and i was =
arguing about our 7 month old at the time not so much arguing but you no wh=
at I mean...and i said to him "hey she trying to get your attention" and he=
 was like I see her and he started like sing to her a silly little song tha=
t didn't have alot of words in it...well when played back words if was unre=
al=C2=A0 he says "ignore her..I ignore her..do you her Ursula" he even says=
 my name Now you have to understand what he says forward is NOTHING like he=
 says backward so i may very very much aware we have those abilities weathe=
r we know it or not...I think on the other side the have mastered it..I'll =
have to go throw alot of file but everyone who hears it
 can't believe it!

--- On Wed, 12/29/10, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:


=
From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] The cas=
e for faces. [11 Attachments]
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, RTSC@yahoogroups=
.com

=C2=A0 


=C2=A0I'm t=
hinking there is faces embedded in sound, it's related to speech, and not j=
ust EVP. It seems to be a normal function of our own minds(living or dead),=
 the same as reverse speech. I found some faces in old EVPs from boxes and =
also in music files. The ones from Evanescence are pretty impressive in per=
son, and do not seem to be intentionaly embedded. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I know, it'=
s not ghost hunters, and most don't want to have to think. I=C2=A0think mos=
t want this stuff in a neat little box, all well defined, all rules and pro=
tocols known, but it just won't stay in one box, or universe for that matte=
r. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Frank-S
